attributes.description:
This 2017 MAZDA CX-3 2.0 DYNAMIC is available on sale for R274,995 it has a MANUAL transmission and is a perfect SUV for your daily driving pleasure. It has BLACK Interior and a beautiful GREY colour. The vehicle has only driven 85000km and is still in great condition.

IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A DIESEL CCLASS WITH GOOD MILEAGE THEN THIS OFFERS THE BEST VALUE IN SA. must be seen to be appreciated.
